main_definition: JVC is not a common idiom or phrase in English, but it can refer to the Japanese electronics company JVC (Japanese Victor Company) or be used as an abbreviation.

meanings_and_examples.example: The JVC sound system is known for its high-quality audio output.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Shortened form of 'just verify' in certain contexts
meanings_and_examples.example: Please jvc the details before finalizing the contract.
Two companies formed a joint venture company (JVC) to collaborate on a new project.
